I am János, the future

I will specialize in Web Development & Design.

View My Work

I will specialize in

Web Development as well as UI/UX layouts for websites and moblile applications.

Web Development

I am currently learning HTML & CSS. Afterwards I will take a course in JavaScript and different frameworks. In my opinion Web Development is an amazing skill to learn and I find it fun and interesting.

UI/UX Design

I will definetly take a Udemy Course for UI/UX Design, because I find it necessary to land a freelance job in Web Development, since most of the time I will design the websites on my own.

interaction

I haven't had any clients yet, however I have great social skills and good communication with other people. One of my strongest traits is that I can work in a team very well.

Concepting

I am always looking to develop my creativity because it helps turn my clients' ideas into reality. Also, I like to find example freelance jobs online and practice with them.
